content: It is difficult to determine exactly how much resource should be allocated to a person to fulfill their basic needs, as this will depend on various factors such as the individual's age, health, and specific needs. Additionally, it is also difficult to determine the exact amount of resources that would be required to incite a person to work, as this will depend on the individual's motivations and circumstances. Some people may be motivated to work for the sense of accomplishment or to contribute to their community, while others may be motivated by financial rewards or the opportunity to advance in their careers. Ultimately, the amount of resources that should be allocated to a person to fulfill their basic needs and incite them to work will depend on a variety of individual and societal factors that need to be carefully considered.
